Package GameLogic

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameLogic.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    main board class which has the implementation of the game logic

      • get

        public int get​(int x,
               int y)
        returns the valid index of the field (-1 if not valid)
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate x
        y - coordinate y
        Returns:
        returns field[pos(x,y)] which will be the index of the field

      • pos

        public int pos​(int x,
               int y)
        using the formula to calculate the index of the field with row and column this method returns the index of the field
        Parameters:
        x - row
        y - column
        Returns:
        calculates the index of the field

      • checkMove

        public int checkMove​(int z)
        returns the valid index of the field, -1 if the index is not valid
        Parameters:
        z - index of the field
        Returns:
        z if it is a valid index

      • placeMark

        public void placeMark​(int z,
                      int rotation,
                      int playerMark)
        method places down the mark on the field and rotates a sub board
        Parameters:
        z - index of the field
        rotation - the indicator to which sub board to rotate and which way
        playerMark - the current player mark 1 or 2

      • rotateBoard

        public void rotateBoard​(int b)
        this method rotates the wanted sub board which ever way was declared
        Parameters:

      • wins

        public boolean wins​(int playerMark)
        this method checks for a win case (5 of the same marks in a row)
        Parameters:
        playerMark - the current player mark 1 or 2
        Returns:
        returns true when the nested for loop finds a win case 5 in a row and false if it does not

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty​(int z)
        method determines weather or not the given index is empty (0 means it is empty)
        Parameters:
        z - the index of the field
        Returns:
        returns true if the declared index is 0 (meaning empty)

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        method determines weather or not the bard is full
        Returns:
        true if there are no indexes with the value of 0 (0 meaning it is empty)

      • Draw

        public boolean Draw()
        method determines weather there is a case for draw
        Returns:
        true if there is a case of a full board or both players winning after a rotation

      • reset

        public void reset()
        resets the board, sets all the values of the field to 0

      • isWinner

        public boolean isWinner​(int playerMark)
        method determines weather the given player mark is set 5 times in a row , meaning a win
        Parameters:
        playerMark - the mark of the current player
        Returns:
        true if there is a case of 5 in a row of the same marks

      • hasWinner

        public boolean hasWinner()
        method determines weather or not the board has a winner
        Returns:
        true if any mark is set in a row of 5 meaning one of the players won

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        method determines weather or not the game is full or has a winner to indicate that the game is over
        Returns:
        true if the board is full or the game has a winner
